TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. They never leave LEO, though.

I wish for more manned interplanetary missions.

Granted. They never leave LEO, though.

I wish for more manned interplanetary missions.

Granted. Sent to Uranus.

I wish for a half bagel/half doughnut breakfast sandwich.

You get such a sandwich, but I won't go near you while you eat it. Not that that's a bad thing, because you're spared having to listen to me lecture excitedly about Linux, cosmology, and/or extrasolar planets.

I wish I could go to Europa.

Granted. Europa Report.

I wish for cake.

I would totally still go to Europa if Europa Report was guaranteed to happen

The Enrichment Center is required to remind you

that you will be baked.

And then there will be cake.

ooooeee

cakecakecakecakecake

Granted, but you go to Russia due to not providing a valid wish. ÃÅ¸Ã‘â‚¬ÃÂ¾ÃÂ²ÃÂ°ÃÂ»! (Wut was dat Russian text?)

I wish more people would like mud.

Granted, everyone loves it so much they eat it and die. Humanity ceases to exist.

I wish radio stations would play more music you could drive fast to.

Granted. You crash and die.

Basically, you would be a ÃÂ¿Ã‘â‚¬ÃÂ¾ÃÂ²ÃÂ°ÃÂ». That means failure.

I wish for this wish to not be a ÃÂ¿Ã‘â‚¬ÃÂ¾ÃÂ²ÃÂ°ÃÂ».

Granted, but nothing happens because the only thing you wished for was for your wish to not be a failure. You go into depression because you regret not wishing for anything else. You end up alone and homeless on the street and you die young.

I wish to not be sad because of that

GrÃƒÂ¤ntÃƒÂ«d, you feel mad about it.

Wish

Granted, but... umm... huh. "Wish." I wonder what I could do with that... hmmmm... maybe- nah, not that. Just give me a while!

...

No... that won't work.

Umm...

ummmmmm...

YOU DIE, OK, YOU JUST DIE, WISH CORRUPTED.

I WISH I DIDN'T SUCK AT CORRUPTING WISHES

Granted, but now you suck at everything else. Even your ability to remind me of Wheatley which you really put on display there.

I wish I had a Miata with a Corvette engine.

Whoa, you're right, I just said that in a Wheatley voice and it came out surprisingly accurate.

Anyways: Granted, but it breaks space-time and explodes with lots of fireworks forming black hole ninja attack battleship helicopters!!!!111111111oneone111

I wish for graham crackers.

they are crackers made out of a man called graham

I wish for the homestuck upd8

Homestuck finally updates, but because you wished it early, it's still not finished. We have to wait another four months for the finale.

I wish for another winter as long as last year's.

Granted. Winter is long, but with summer temperatures.

I wish to live in a Mediterranean climate. Perth, maybe.

Granted. We all freeze.

Ninja'd. You move to antarctica

I wish it was still the weekend.

Granted: But you're homeless again because you couldn't pay your taxes because you can't work on weekends!!! 8-]

(it's been a pretty long weekend)

I wish KSP would run (preferably well) on my little internet-calculatorlaptop.

Your little laptop inexplicably has an extra zero added to all its stats across the board, becoming an overpowered supercomputer. Unfortunately, its case becomes substantially weaker, and you never want to use it for fear of breaking keys.

I wish I looked good in makeup.

Granted. You no longer look good without makeup.

I wish women's magazines weren't so harmful to self image. (Some possibly NSFW language in that image.)

Same. I can't think of a way to corrupt that wish because almost any degree of upheaval would be an improvement as long as it involved those bulls[ ]t magazines getting their act together / ceasing to exist.

I wish the next poster would come up with a good wish.

Granted.

[WISH REDACTED]

Granted. [CORRUPTION REDACTED]

I wish for moar boosters.

Granted, but they all horrible ISP and little fuel.

I wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish for a wish that wishes for a wish for a wish for a wish.

Granted. It's corrupted by corruption that corrupts the corruption that corrupted it.

I wish I was a better guitarist.
